Contradict fact: The claim itself contradicts the fact that the photo of the "busty wasp" was manipulated and not a real depiction of the insect.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the appearance of the wasp by describing it as "busty" and comparing it to a human celebrity.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting the manipulated photo as a genuine depiction of the wasp.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the existence of the "Cardi Bee" wasp.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the manipulated photo accurately represents a real species of wasp, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations for the manipulated photo.
